column4: How can I get my laptop volume buttons to adjust the master sound rather than turn up and down the Mic????????
No matter what I change, the keyboard layout and whatnot. It is dead set on only changing the mic.
volume > properties >  select the device that u want to control , at this window you choose master volume
at least this is what appear mine
you want to adjust volume button on keyboard ?
then i understand wrong :) i look how this working here
from menu System > Preferences > keyboard shortcut
Already did that. I got my keys set. The problem is, that when I use the volume up and down keys. It changing the mics volume, instead of master.
if you want to adjust volume as temp solution you can use alsamixer from command line till you solve it
I got it, I had to focus it in the main sound dialog.
